Package com.csse3200.game.components.currencysystem

Class CurrencyManagerComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.currencysystem.CurrencyManagerComponent
public class CurrencyManagerComponent extends Component
Manages the player's currencies within the game. This component keeps track of different types of currencies (e.g., metal scraps) and provides methods to add, subtract, and retrieve amounts of each type. Trigger "updateCurrencyUI" with current currency amount not the added or subtracted value

    • create

      public void create()
      Description copied from class: Component
      Called when the entity is created and registered. Initial logic such as calls to GetComponent should be made here, not in the constructor which is called before an entity is finished.
      Overrides:
      create in class Component

    • getCurrencyAmount

      public int getCurrencyAmount(CurrencyComponent.CurrencyType type)
      Gets the current amount of the given currency type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of currency to check
      Returns:
      the current amount of the specified currency, or 0 if none exists

    • canAffordAndSpendCurrency

      public boolean canAffordAndSpendCurrency(Map<CurrencyComponent.CurrencyType,Integer> costMap)
      Checks if the player has enough currency to cover the specified cost, and if so, deducts the amount and returns true. Otherwise, returns false and does not deduct anything. Usage: playerEntity.getComponent(CurrencyManagerComponent.class).canAffordAndSpendCurrency(costMap)
      Parameters:
      costMap - a map of CurrencyComponent.CurrencyType to the required amount for each type
      Returns:
      true if the player can afford the cost and the player's currencies are deducted, false if the player cannot afford the cost

    • refundCurrency

      public void refundCurrency(Map<CurrencyComponent.CurrencyType,Integer> costMap, float refundRate)
      Refunds a portion of the tower’s cost according to the specified refund rate. Usage: playerEntity.getComponent(CurrencyManagerComponent.class).refundCurrency(costMap)
      Parameters:
      costMap - a map of CurrencyComponent.CurrencyType to the required amount for each type
      refundRate - the refund rate of the cost
